name: Kara Carrell
bio: Kara Carrell is a Developer by day, CommuniTechie by night, and a Queer Blaxican changemaker always. Kara codes at Table XI, a software development consultancy dedicated to tech done right, and sheâ€™s an advocate for under-indexed folks in the community through her work as a Chapter Organizer for Write/Speak/Code. Kara enjoys communicating through gifs, zines, playlists, and astrological birth charts. She lives in Chicago, and is the human of the cutest dog EVAR, Sadie.
